SEARCH
Module JEDI_FlipFit_GroupD_POS_Project
Package com.flipkart.dao.interfaces

Interface IFlipFitGymCustomerDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymCustomerDAOImpl
public interface IFlipFitGymCustomerDAO
Interface for managing gym customers and their interactions with the gym.

  • Method Details

    • viewBookedSlots

      List<FlipFitSlots> viewBookedSlots(int userID)
      Retrieves the list of booked slots for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose booked slots are to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A list of slots booked by the user.

    • checkBookingConflicts

      FlipFitBooking checkBookingConflicts(int userId, int slotTime)
      Checks if there are any conflicts with an existing booking for the given user and slot time.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      slotTime - The time of the slot being checked for conflicts.
      Returns:
      A booking object if there is a conflict, otherwise null.

    • viewCentres

      List<FlipFitGymCentre> viewCentres()
      Retrieves the list of gym centers available for the user.
      Returns:
      A list of gym centers.

    • makePayment

      boolean makePayment(int userID)
      Makes a payment for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user making the payment.
      Returns:
      true if the payment is successful, false otherwise.

    • viewPaymentDetails

      void viewPaymentDetails(int userID)
      Views the payment details for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose payment details are to be viewed.

    • editPaymentDetails

      void editPaymentDetails(int userID)
      Edits the payment details for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose payment details are to be edited.

    • addUser

      FlipFitUser addUser(FlipFitUser user)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be added.
      Returns:
      The added user object.

    • editDetails

      FlipFitGymCustomer editDetails(FlipFitGymCustomer customer)
      Edits the details of a gym customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The gym customer whose details are to be edited.
      Returns:
      The updated customer object.

    • addCustomer

      FlipFitGymCustomer addCustomer(FlipFitGymCustomer customer, FlipFitUser user)
      Adds a new gym customer to the system, along with the associated user information.
      Parameters:
      customer - The gym customer to be added.
      user - The associated user information for the customer.
      Returns:
      The added gym customer object.
